property.name: hive.exec.scratchdir
property.description: HDFS root scratch dir for Hive jobs which gets created with write all (733) permission. For each connecting user, an HDFS scratch dir: ${hive.exec.scratchdir}/<username> is created, with ${hive.scratch.dir.permission}.

property.name: hive.metastore.uris
property.description: Thrift URI for the remote metastore. Used by metastore client to connect to remote metastore.

property.name: hive.metastore.warehouse.dir
property.description: location of default database for the warehouse
